overview:
Hessel van Oorschot is the Chief of Noise at the Tribe of Noise - a music community that connects musicians, songwriters and composers with each other and with companies around the globe in need of great music.

He is also the co-founder of Punda Milia, a Dutch agency specialized in web strategy and sociale media strategy for small and medium sized enterprises. His interests include international business development, new media, tribes, social networking and gadgets!

With books, films and interaction workshops, Hessel is a leading proponent of entrepreneurship in The Netherlands, helping thousands of entrepreneurs to put new technology and business models into practice.
